# Template

This is a template post for the galiwatch blog!

To make a new post: 

1.  copy template folder
2.  edit title and date in `index.qmd` of the new directory, and set `draft: false`
3.  rename the folder
4.  click 'render' (or ctrl + shift + k)

Have fun :))
